name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Maps Button from search results

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Maps Button access from search results. Simplify navigation and save time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Google search experience with the "Google Maps Button from Search Results" extension. 

This powerful extension adds a convenient button directly to your search results, providing instant access to Google Maps for any location you search for. No more copying and pasting addresses or extra clicks—simply click the button and be taken straight to the map.

Whether you're planning a trip, finding a new restaurant, or exploring a new area, this extension makes it easier and faster to get the information you need. Key features include:

• Instant Access: Adds a Google Maps button to search results for quick navigation.
Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with Google search, appearing naturally alongside your search results.
• Time-Saving: Reduces the steps needed to access maps, saving you valuable time.
• User-Friendly: Simple to use with no configuration required. Just install and go!
• Global Support: Works with multiple Google domains worldwide, making it perfect for travelers and international users.
• Transform the way you use Google search with the "Google Maps Button from Search Results" extension. Navigate quickly, save time, and enjoy a more efficient search experience. Install now and make your searches more productive!
